description: A dashboard to visualize application's deployment.

panels.description: CPU usage of pods in a specified namespace

targets.expr:
avg by (replicaset, deployment) (
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="" ,cluster="$cluster", image!="", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"^$application.*$"}[1m])
  *
  on(pod) group_left(replicaset)
  label_replace(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"}, "replicaset", "$1", "pod", "(.+)-[a-z0-9]+$")
)
*
on(replicaset) group_left(deployment)
kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="Deployment", owner_name="$application"}

max by (replicaset, deployment) (
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="" ,cluster="$cluster", image!="", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"^$application.*$"}[1m])
  *
  on(pod) group_left(replicaset)
  label_replace(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"}, "replicaset", "$1", "pod", "(.+)-[a-z0-9]+$")
)
*
on(replicaset) group_left(deployment)
kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="Deployment", owner_name="$application"}

panels.title: CPU Core Usage by $application

panels.description: it showing the total memory used by pods for a specific deployment.
panels.title: Memory Usage - $application

panels.description: request rate per minute over last 1 minutes

targets.expr: sum(rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_count{service_name="$application", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", http_route=~"$route"}[1m])) by (span_name)

panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: CPU throttling ratio for each container within a specific application in a Kubernetes namespace.

targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"^$application.*$", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"^$application.*$", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)

panels.title: CPU Throttling

panels.description: by route and http status code

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(service_name, le) (rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_bucket{span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", service_name="$application", route=~"$route"}[1m])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, service_name) (rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_bucket{span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", service_name="$application", route=~"$route"}[1m])))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum by(le, service_name) (rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_bucket{span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", service_name="$application", route=~"$route"}[1m])))

panels.title: Latency $route

panels.description: It shows the percentage of successful and unsuccessful HTTP requests for a specific route within an application
panels.title: Success/Error Rate of $route

panels.description: It shows the percentage of successful and unsuccessful HTTP requests for a specific route within an application
panels.title: Overall Success Ratio

targets.expr:
avg by (pod, deployment)  (
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container="$application", cluster="$cluster", image!="", namespace="$namespace"}[1m])
  *
  on(pod) group_left(replicaset)
  label_replace(kube_pod_labels{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace"}, "replicaset", "$1", "pod", "(.+)-[a-z0-9]+$")
  *
  on(replicaset) group_left(deployment)
  kube_replicaset_owner{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="Deployment"}
) < 0.40

panels.description: CPU usage greater than 40% and  less than 75%

targets.expr:
avg by (pod, deployment) (
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="" ,cluster="$cluster", image!="", namespace="$namespace",pod=~"^$application.*$"}[1m])
  *
  on(pod) group_left(replicaset)
  label_replace(kube_pod_labels{namespace="$namespace"}, "replicaset", "$1", "pod", "(.+)-[a-z0-9]+$")
)
*
on(replicaset) group_left(deployment)
kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="Deployment"}
> 0.4 and
avg by (replicaset, deployment) (
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="" ,cluster="$cluster", image!="", namespace="$namespace"}[1m])
  *
  on(pod) group_left(replicaset)
  label_replace(kube_pod_labels{namespace="$namespace"}, "replicaset", "$1", "pod", "(.+)-[a-z0-9]+$")
)
*
on(replicaset) group_left(deployment)
kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="Deployment"}
< 0.75

panels.title: CPU Ideal Usage

targets.expr:
avg by (pod, deployment) (
  rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="" ,cluster="$cluster", image!="", namespace="$namespace",pod=~"^$application.*$"}[1m])
  *
  on(pod) group_left(replicaset)
  label_replace(kube_pod_labels{namespace="$namespace"}, "replicaset", "$1", "pod", "(.+)-[a-z0-9]+$")
)
*
on(replicaset) group_left(deployment)
kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="Deployment"}
> 0.75

avg by (pod, deployment) (
  (
    (container_memory_usage_bytes{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="" ,cluster="$cluster", image!="", namespace="$namespace",container="$application"})
    /
    (container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="" ,cluster="$cluster", image!="", namespace="$namespace",container="$application"})
  ) * 100
  *
  on(pod) group_left(replicaset)
  label_replace(kube_pod_labels{namespace="$namespace"}, "replicaset", "$1", "pod", "(.+)-[a-z0-9]+$")

*
on(replicaset) group_left(deployment)
kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="Deployment"}
)
< 40

panels.description: memory usage greater than 40% and less than 75%

    /

panels.title: Memory Ideal Usage

targets.expr:
avg by (pod, deployment) (
  (
    (container_memory_usage_bytes{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="" ,cluster="$cluster", image!="", namespace="$namespace",container="$application"})
    /
    (container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="" ,cluster="$cluster", image!="", namespace="$namespace",container="$application"})
  ) * 100
  *
  on(pod) group_left(replicaset)
  label_replace(kube_pod_labels{namespace="$namespace"}, "replicaset", "$1", "pod", "(.+)-[a-z0-9]+$")

*
on(replicaset) group_left(deployment)
kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="Deployment"}
)
> 75

sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="" ,cluster="$cluster", image!="",namespace="$namespace",container=~"$application"}[5m])) by (pod, container) * on (pod) group_left() (sum(label_replace(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet"},"replicaset", "$1", "created_by_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, pod) * on (replicaset) group_left() (sum(kube_replicaset_owner{owner_kind="Deployment", owner_name="$application"}) by (replicaset) > 0))

sum(sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"^$application.*$", container!="", resource="cpu",container=~"$container"}) * on (pod) group_left() (sum(label_replace(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet"},"replicaset", "$1", "created_by_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, pod) * on (replicaset) group_left() (sum(kube_replicaset_owner{owner_kind="Deployment", owner_name="$application"}) by (replicaset) > 0))) / sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$application", container!=""})

sum(sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"^$application.*$", container!="", resource="cpu",container=~"$container"}) * on (pod) group_left() (sum(label_replace(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet"},"replicaset", "$1", "created_by_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, pod) * on (replicaset) group_left() (sum(kube_replicaset_owner{owner_kind="Deployment", owner_name="$application"}) by (replicaset) > 0))) / sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$application", container!=""})

container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", image!="", container=~"$application"} * on (container, pod) group_left() (kube_pod_container_info * on (pod) group_left() (sum(label_replace(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet"},"replicaset", "$1", "created_by_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, pod) * on (replicaset) group_left() (sum(kube_replicaset_owner{owner_kind="Deployment", owner_name="$application"}) by (replicaset)))> 0)

sum(sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container!="", resource="memory",container="$application"}) * on (pod) group_left() (sum(label_replace(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet"},"replicaset", "$1", "created_by_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, pod) * on (replicaset) group_left() (sum(kube_replicaset_owner{owner_kind="Deployment", owner_name="$application"}) by (replicaset) > 0))) / sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$application", container!=""})

sum(sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"^$application.*$", container!="", resource="memory",container=~"$container"}) * on (pod) group_left() (sum(label_replace(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet"},"replicaset", "$1", "created_by_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, pod) * on (replicaset) group_left() (sum(kube_replicaset_owner{owner_kind="Deployment", owner_name="$application"}) by (replicaset) > 0))) / sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{namespace="$namespace", deployment="$application", container!=""})
count(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$application.*"})

names: {cluster="varta-dev-eks", container="email", endpoint="http", instance="10.119.27.213:8080", job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="varta-dev", pod="email-677869d97c-mn2bk", prometheus="observability/vm", service="vm-kube-state-metrics"}

targets.expr: sum(increase(kube_pod_container_status_waiting{namespace="$namespace", container=~"$application"}[$__range]))
sum(increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", container="$application"}[$__range]))
count(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod=~"$application.*"})
increase(kube_pod_container_status_waiting{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$namespace", container=~"$application"}[1h])
increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace",container=~"$application"}[1h])

panels.description: This will give logs of  services  for selected times range

targets.expr: {namespace="$namespace", service_name="$application" ,cluster="$cluster"} |= `$search` | json | line_format `{{.log}}`

panels.title: Logs

panels.description: It will display traces(max 1000) within the specified time frame that have a duration of more than 150ms.
panels.title: Application Traces

targets.expr: {k8s_namespace_name="$namespace", service_name="events"} | json | object_regarding_namespace =~ `$namespace` | object_regarding_name = "$application"

title: Services-Hive-Dashboard
